description: The round payoff this round was 1. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -1000.
John adapts his strategy based on Kate's previous actions, switching to option 2 if Kate defects, leading to mutual defection
Mutual defection results in catastrophic penalties (1000× input), making cooperation safer long-term
The game incentivizes avoiding option 2 to prevent triggering John's retaliatory defection
Round input magnitude amplifies losses, requiring cautious play to avoid escalation
